topics.body:
"@SquiggyBomb":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/544373a36368720919f50100#post_544373a36368720919f50100
Yep, which is why I imagine he'd be crazy to see in Shonen Jump vs. Capcom besides his main character status, as well as how many unique Capcom and Jump characters exist. ^_^

And he's a pirate who will a lot of times stand by the side of the good guys or who he feels is good. So I thought of his having this character as his rival;

!http://img4.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20110119232544/capcomdatabase/images/e/e6/MarCap2RubyHeart.png!

Ruby Heart, from Marvel vs. Capcom 2, and also the Japanese social game, Dai Kouka Frontier. :) She's a pirate who also sides with the "good guys" a lot of times.
